item.title: Install and Set Up ADB and Android Drivers on PC & Enable and Allow USB Debug and OEM Unlock on Android Device - Guide
item.description: Authored by AH License Notice This article is published under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 4.0 International (CC BY-NC-SA 4.0) license. Table of Contents Introduction Prerequisites 1. Set Up ADB on PC 1-1 On Windows - Admin Privilege Required 1-2 On Windows - NO Admin Privilege Required 1-3 On Linux - Package 1-4 On Linux - Manual Configuration 2. Configure ADB to work on the Android device 2-1 Enable USB Debugging and Allow OEM Unlocking on the Android device 2-2 Allow USB debugging of the device by the PC 3.

item.title: About me
item.description: Hi ðŸ‘‹, I am AH, a computer technology, smartphone technology, cybersecurity, digital privacy, and digital forensics enthusiast. With a special interest in FOSS (Free and Open Source Software). Why this blog exists This website is dedicated to documenting those aforementioned interests and sharing them on the internet ðŸ˜„. My objective is to compile the resources I have used and knowledge I have learned throughout the years onto a quick and convient place to access.
